se.rupy.http
Class Failure

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          java.io.IOException
              se.rupy.http.Failure
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Failure
extends java.io.IOException

The failure, if thrown, does not display the error to the user but disconnects the client. Useful if you receive hack attempts or similar unwanted requests. Also used internally to jump the 500 Internal Server Error bridge.

Author:
marc
